plot: Investigative journalist Virtus Coolidge and historian Sincerity Newton navigate obstacles of new media politics, apathetic and psychotic friends, and forbidden love as they expose a radical's unusual hit list.
plot_en: Investigative journalist Virtus Coolidge and historian Sincerity Newton navigate obstacles of new media politics, apathetic and psychotic friends, and forbidden love as they expose a radical's unusual hit list.
plot_es: Investigative journalist Virtus Coolidge and historian Sincerity Newton navigate obstacles of new media politics, apathetic and psychotic friends, and forbidden love as they expose a radical's unusual hit list.
title: Romans XIII
